EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-05-22 AWS v Azure.ES-2019-05-22 AWS v. Azure Invite 1 - Marketo.Email A
EmailTemplate.subject: =?utf-8?Q?How_To_Unlock_AWS_And_Azure_Discounts_=F0=9F=92=B0?=
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-azure-discounts/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
According to Gartner, 70% of organizations will overspend in the public cloud without a cloud cost management plan. With a rapidly changing cloud landscape, it is critical that you continuously evaluate your AWS and Azure discount options to deliver on the cost savings promised in the public cloud.
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-azure-discounts/]]>
Join us on May 15th at 11 am ET <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-azure-discounts/]]> for the next installment of our AWS vs. Azure webinar series! You will learn from cloud expert, Mor Cohen-Tal (CTO of Cloud) as she discusses:
- Fundamental discounting mechanisms available in AWS and Azure - How to optimally plan for new RIs purchases - How to maximize your current RI coverage - How to maximize RI utilization
I hope you will join us! Register now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-azure-discounts/]]> and enter to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card.
Thanks, Andrew
PS - If you can't attend, register <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-azure-discounts/]]> anyway and we will send you the recording afterward.
